comments:

	at intuitive.audit.Audit.main(Audit.java:730)

I believe this is related to Bug 11346.

After someone registers a launch with us twice, then deregisters the launch,
we're left with a ghost-launch. I believe the NPE is occurring here because the
ghost-launch doesn't have a console document.
This was a client programming error.
